tasks.name: Root Callback
tasks.text: Contains all the parts of a tooltip.

tasks.name: Benefits of Using Interfaces:
tasks.text:
Type Safety: Interfaces provide type checking, ensuring that objects adhere to a specific structure. This helps catch type-related errors at compile time.

Documentation: Interfaces serve as documentation for your code, making it clear what properties an object should have.

Code Maintainability: Interfaces make your code more maintainable because they define a contract that objects must follow, which helps prevent unexpected changes.
